key_risks: High Concentration Risk: TechSource Inc. is a single source for $4.2M annual spend, creating critical dependency.
Imminent Contract Expiry: GlobalComp Solutions' contract expires in 3 months, posing immediate continuity risk. TechSource Inc. expires in 6 months.
Subpar Delivery Performance: GlobalComp Solutions' 85% on-time delivery is below target, impacting operational efficiency.
Significant Spend Concentration: Two suppliers (TechSource, GlobalComp) account for over 75% of the category spend, amplifying disruption impact.
negotiation_levers: Volume Commitment: Leverage total category spend ($9.1M) for improved pricing and service levels.
Performance Improvement: Demand specific on-time delivery improvements from GlobalComp Solutions as a condition for renewal.
Competitive Sourcing: Initiate RFPs for GlobalComp Solutions and TechSource Inc. to introduce competition and identify alternatives.
Longer Contract Terms: Offer extended contract durations in exchange for price stability or enhanced service levels.
recommended_actions_next_90_days: Initiate RFP for GlobalComp Solutions: Immediately launch an RFP to address contract expiry (3 months) and poor delivery performance, exploring alternative suppliers.

Develop Multi-Sourcing Strategy for TechSource Inc.: Begin identifying and qualifying at least two alternative suppliers to mitigate single-source dependency and prepare for contract renegotiation (6 months).
Engage TechSource Inc. for Early Renegotiation: Proactively open discussions to secure favorable terms and address single-source risk before the 6-month expiry.
Implement Performance Improvement Plan with GlobalComp Solutions: Define and track specific on-time delivery improvement targets with GlobalComp, regardless of renewal outcome.
Review IT Hardware Sourcing Strategy: Conduct a comprehensive review to identify opportunities for further diversification and risk reduction across the category.
